services.name: Adventure Companion
services.description: These PUGs hire themselves out to go on adventures with other online players. They grant a +2 to dice rolls they can help with.

services.name: Text Message Partner
services.description: These PUGs offer company to folks who want someone to talk to. Texting with them grants you a +1 to all Presence rolls for the day.

services.name: Kinky Dungeon Friend
services.description: These sex workers are PUGs with high-level avatars who offer a unique experience. It's part dungeon crawl assistance and part kinky fun. It's not for everyone, but .dungeon devs haven't shied away from creating a safe space for sex workers to offer their brand of entertainment. They grant a +2 to all rolls.
